firstAid.location: Near the Main Entrance (look for the Red Cross tent)
firstAid.description: Qualified first aiders are on site throughout the event.

eventSecurity.description: On-site security team. Find them near any entrance or flag a volunteer.

safetyTips: Keep colour powder away from eyes and mouth. If irritation occurs, rinse with water.
Stay hydrated — free water stations are located around the venue.
Wear clothes you don't mind getting colourful! White is traditional.
Keep valuables in sealed zip-lock bags to protect from colour powder.
Apply coconut oil or sunscreen to exposed skin before play — makes cleanup easier.
Supervise children at all times during colour throwing.
If you feel unwell, visit the First Aid tent near the Main Entrance immediately.
Know your exits — there are entrances/exits on the north and south sides of the park.
